title: ABE_IntakeSession_v1
description: Schema for a single Intake + OCR session in the A.B.E. engine.

module.description: Must be exactly 'Intake' for all intake artifacts.

doc_type.description: Declared or inferred type of document.

original_file_name.description: Name of the uploaded file as seen by the user/browser.

original_file_hash.description: Hex-encoded SHA-256 hash of the original file.

ocr_used.description: Whether OCR was used (true for images, false for pure text uploads).

text_raw.description: Optional raw text as produced directly by OCR or text extraction.

text_normalized.description: Normalized, cleaned text used for field extraction. Required even if same as text_raw.

extracted_fields.description: Document-type-specific fields detected by the intake parser (may be edited by the user).

targets.description: List of A.B.E. modules this intake session is configured to feed.

generated_outputs.description: Metadata about files generated for downstream modules.

ciri.description: Info about the generated CIRI CSV, if any.

row_count.description: Number of rows in the generated CIRI CSV (usually 1 for a single case/scenario).

csv_inline.description: Optional inline CSV content for quick inspection or regeneration.

hash.description: Hex-encoded SHA-256 hash of the generated CIRI CSV.

cda.description: Info about the generated CDA JSON scenario, if any.

scenario.description: Inline CDA scenario object (structure defined by cda/schema.json).

hash.description: Hex-encoded SHA-256 hash of the generated CDA JSON.

cff.description: Info about the generated CFF CSV, if any.

row_count.description: Number of rows in the generated CFF CSV.

csv_inline.description: Optional inline CSV content for funding line items.

hash.description: Hex-encoded SHA-256 hash of the generated CFF CSV.

ccri.description: Info about the generated CCRI JSON scenario, if any.

scenario.description: Inline CCRI scenario object (structure defined by ccri/schema.json).

hash.description: Hex-encoded SHA-256 hash of the generated CCRI JSON.

created_at.description: ISO-8601 timestamp when this intake artifact was created (local browser time).

notes.description: Optional notes about this intake session or how the document was interpreted.
